description: Digital Marketing Basics â€“ An overview of the terminology and fundamentals of digital marketing. Covers first steps of a marketing plan, ad units, ad format terminology, branding vs. lead generation and targeting. There is a nine page reference guide with the course with full explanations of all the terms used in the course. It will take about 30-minutes to complete the course. It is broken into five sections. This course will give you the confidence and knowledge to sell digital marketing.
title: Digital Marketing Basics in 5 Easy Steps
